<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>Our cleaned dataset has <strong>43326</strong> rows and <strong>18</strong> columns. This dataset is now ready to be used for <em>Data Analysis</em>.</p>
<p>This dataset can be exported for storage in <strong>csv</strong> format, excel's <strong>xslx</strong> formant or inserted as a table in a <strong>Relaional Database</strong>. We will continue our activity to conducting some Exploratory Data Analysis on our dataset.</p>
<h2 id="4.-Data-Analysis">4. Data Analysis<a class="anchor-link" href="#4.-Data-Analysis">¶</a></h2><p>Questions to be Answered:</p>
<ol>
<li>What are the popular brands?</li>
<li>What are the most expensive cars by brand?</li>
<li>How do car prices differ by odometer readings?</li>
</ol>
<h3 id="Exploring-Brand-Popularity">Exploring Brand Popularity<a class="anchor-link" href="#Exploring-Brand-Popularity">¶</a></h3><p>Here we will try to answer the first question where we would like to find the top ten popular brands from our dataset.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [33]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Frequency table for "brand" column</span>
<span class="n">pop_brand</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'brand'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">value_counts</span><span class="p">()[:</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">pop_brand</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[33]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>brand
volkswagen       9238
bmw              5056
mercedes_benz    4361
opel             4291
audi             4066
ford             2875
renault          1933
peugeot          1277
fiat             1021
seat              765
Name: count, dtype: int64</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>From the Frequency table above, we can easily see that <strong>volkswagen</strong> is the most popular brand with frequency of <strong>9238</strong>. We can display the results on a horizonatal bar plot.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [34]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Plotting a horizonatal barplot for the frequency table</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">pop_brand</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">barh</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">color</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'brown'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">visible</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tick_params</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labeltop</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labelbottom</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xticks</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">4000</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">8000</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xticklabels</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'4,000'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'8,000'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_yticklabels</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Volkswagen'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'BMW'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Mercedes'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Opel'</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                    <span class="s1">'Audi'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Ford'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Renault'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Peugeot'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Fiat'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Seat'</span><span class="p">],</span>\
                   <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">2000</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Most Popular Brand'</span><span class="p">,</span> \
        <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'bold'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">14</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">1.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'Volkswagen is the most popular car brand'</span><span class="p">,</span>\
        <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'heavy'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">invert_yaxis</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,"
>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>From the chart above, one may easily be able to detect which car brand is the most popular one. <strong>Volkswagen</strong> is the most popular car brand.</p>
<h3 id="Exploring-Price-by-Brand">Exploring Price by Brand<a class="anchor-link" href="#Exploring-Price-by-Brand">¶</a></h3><p>Let us now explore which brands asks a high price on average. We are also going to find the top ten most expensive brands.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [35]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">price_by_brand</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">auto</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groupby</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'brand'</span><span class="p">])[</span><span class="s1">'price'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ascending</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)[:</span><span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">]</span>
<span class="n">price_by_brand</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[35]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>brand
porsche           34296.164557
land_rover        18518.610526
jeep              11621.009524
sonstige_autos    11536.438172
mini              10846.144550
jaguar             9487.169014
audi               9326.134530
bmw                8561.528481
mercedes_benz      8460.017886
chevrolet          7221.761421
Name: price, dtype: float64</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>From the above table, on <strong>average</strong> the most expensive cars are the <strong>Porsche</strong> which are selling at an average price of <strong>34,296.16 US dollars</strong>. Following is a visualisation of the above findings.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [36]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">5</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">4</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">price_by_brand</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">barh</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">''</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xticks</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">15000</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="mi">30000</span><span class="p">])</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_xticklabels</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'0'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'15,000'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'30,000'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_yticklabels</span><span class="p">([</span><span class="s1">'Porsche'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Land Rover'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Jeep'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Sonstige'</span><span class="p">,</span>\
                    <span class="s1">'Mini'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Jaguar'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Audi'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'BMW'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'Mercedes'</span><span class="p">,</span> \
                    <span class="s1">'Chevrolet'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">10</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">6000</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mi">2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Average Price by Brand"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'bold'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">1.5</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Porsche is on average the most expensive brand"</span><span class="p">,</span>\
        <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'heavy'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">invert_yaxis</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">tick_params</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">labeltop</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">True</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">labelbottom</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">grid</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">visible</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,"
>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Exploring-price-by-Mileage">Exploring price by Mileage<a class="anchor-link" href="#Exploring-price-by-Mileage">¶</a></h3><p>This is a market of secondhand cars and the expectation is that a car with a high mileage should fetch a lower price if compared to a car whose mileage is low, holding other factors constant. Cars are expected to depreciate in value as they are being used and one of the measures for indicating how much value the car has lost is mileage, the higher the mileage the lower the price. The <strong>auto</strong> dataset will be used to verify if the presumed assumption holds.</p>
<p>In this section, average car prices will be determined in relation to their mileage. The odometer readings will be grouped into three groups: <strong>50,000 Km</strong>, <strong>100,000 Km</strong> and <strong>150,000 Km</strong>.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [37]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># creating a new column "odometer_km_group"</span>
<span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">pd</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">cut</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km'</span><span class="p">],</span> <span class="mi">3</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">astype</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'str'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'(101666.667, 150000.0]'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'150,000 Km'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span>\
<span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'(53333.333, 101666.667]'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'100,000 Km'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">str</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">replace</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'(4855.0, 53333.333]'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'50,000 Km'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">regex</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">auto</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">unique</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[37]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>array(['150,000 Km', '100,000 Km', '50,000 Km'], dtype=object)</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The new column <code>odemeter_km_group</code> has been created which will be used in the analysis.</p>
<p>The following is a calculation of average prices for every group in <code>odometer_km_group</code> column.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [38]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Create a groupby and calculate average prices</span>
<span class="n">mileage_group</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">auto</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">groupby</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s1">'odometer_km_group'</span><span class="p">)[</span><span class="s1">'price'</span><span class="p">]</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">mean</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">sort_values</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">ascending</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="kc">False</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">mileage_group</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt output_prompt">Out[38]:</div>




<div class="output_text output_subarea output_execute_result">
<pre>odometer_km_group
50,000 Km     14651.190083
100,000 Km     9633.555942
150,000 Km     4426.330513
Name: price, dtype: float64</pre>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<p>The above output has verified the assumption that was made that cars with higher mileage are more likely to fetch a lower price on the market. In other words, the value of the car is inversely related to its odometer readings. The average price for cars with <strong>150,000 Km</strong> is lower than the average price of cars in the <strong>50,000 Km</strong> group.</p>
<p>The same results can still be presented on a <strong>donut</strong> chart.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [39]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Donut chart for average prices against odometer readings</span>
<span class="n">fig</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">ax</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">subplots</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">figsize</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">))</span>
<span class="n">mileage_group</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">plot</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">pie</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">colors</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'brown'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'green'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'blue'</span><span class="p">],</span>\
                       <span class="n">wedgeprops</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="p">{</span><span class="s1">'linewidth'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="mi">6</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="s1">'edgecolor'</span><span class="p">:</span> <span class="s1">'#EEEEEE'</span><span class="p">},</span> <span class="n">startangle</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">90</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rcParams</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'font.family'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">rcParams</span><span class="p">[</span><span class="s1">'font.size'</span><span class="p">]</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">8</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">set_axis_off</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">ylabel</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="s2">""</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">my_circle</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">Circle</span><span class="p">(</span> <span class="p">(</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">,</span><span class="mi">0</span><span class="p">),</span> <span class="mf">0.7</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">color</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="s1">'#EEEEEE'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">p</span><span class="o">=</span><span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">gcf</span><span class="p">()</span>
<span class="n">p</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">gca</span><span class="p">()</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">add_artist</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">my_circle</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">0.8</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.36</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Average Prices by Odometer Readings"</span><span class="p">,</span>\
        <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">12</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'bold'</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">ax</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">text</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="n">x</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="o">-</span><span class="mf">0.9</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">y</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">1.2</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">s</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s2">"Cars with Odometer readings of around 50,000 </span><span class="se">\n</span><span class="s2">         </span><span class="se">\</span>
<span class="s2">kilometers are expensive on average"</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">weight</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'heavy'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">size</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mi">11</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">family</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="s1">'serif'</span><span class="p">,</span> <span class="n">alpha</span> <span class="o">=</span> <span class="mf">0.6</span><span class="p">)</span>
<span class="n">plt</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">show</span><span class="p">()</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="output_wrapper">
<div class="output">


<div class="output_area">

    <div class="prompt"></div>




<div class="output_png output_subarea ">
<img src="data:image/png;base64,"
>
</div>

</div>

</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">
<h3 id="Conclution">Conclution<a class="anchor-link" href="#Conclution">¶</a></h3><p>This marks the end of the project. The main purpose was to <strong>clean</strong> the data making it ready for Analysis. Some intial Explorary Data Analysis were also conducted to understand important relationships among columns and discriptive statistics.</p>
<p>The dataset will finally be exported as a <strong>csv file</strong> for storage in the local drive (Desktop) and will be assigned to variable <strong>auto_cars</strong>.</p>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing code_cell rendered">
<div class="input">
<div class="prompt input_prompt">In [40]:</div>
<div class="inner_cell">
    <div class="input_area">
<div class=" highlight hl-ipython3"><pre><span></span><span class="c1"># Export the dataset</span>
<span class="n">auto</span><span class="o">.</span><span class="n">to_csv</span><span class="p">(</span><span class="sa">r</span><span class="s2">"C:\Users\j\Desktop\auto_cars.csv"</span><span class="p">)</span>
</pre></div>

    </div>
</div>
</div>

</div>
<div class="cell border-box-sizing text_cell rendered"><div class="prompt input_prompt">
</div><div class="inner_cell">
<div class="text_cell_render border-box-sizing rendered_html">

</div>
